1.name: The Matrix
1.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

2.name: Fight Club
2.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

3.name: American Beauty
3.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

4.name: American Pie
4.description: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

5.name: The Green Mile
5.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

6.name: The Sixth Sense
6.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

7.name: Eyes Wide Shut
7.description: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife reveals a painful secret to him.

8.name: Sleepy Hollow
8.description: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

9.name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
9.description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

10.name: Office Space
10.description: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

11.name: 10 Things I Hate About You
11.description: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

12.name: The Mummy
12.description: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreck havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

13.name: Girl, Interrupted
13.description: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.

14.name: Cruel Intentions
14.description: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

15.name: Toy Story 2
15.description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

16.name: Notting Hill
16.description: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

17.name: The Virgin Suicides
17.description: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

18.name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
18.description: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

19.name: The Blair Witch Project
19.description: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

20.name: Varsity Blues
20.description: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

21.name: She's All That
21.description: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

22.name: Magnolia
22.description: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

23.name: Big Daddy
23.description: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

24.name: Tarzan
24.description: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

25.name: The Ninth Gate
25.description: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

26.name: Dogma
26.description: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

27.name: Galaxy Quest
27.description: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

28.name: The World Is Not Enough
28.description: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

29.name: The Haunting
29.description: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

30.name: Deep Blue Sea
30.description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

31.name: Wild Wild West
31.description: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

32.name: Being John Malkovich
32.description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

33.name: The Cider House Rules
33.description: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

34.name: The Boondock Saints
34.description: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

35.name: 8MM
35.description: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

36.name: Lake Placid
36.description: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

37.name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
37.description: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

38.name: Mystery Men
38.description: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

39.name: Jawbreaker
39.description: Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jawbreaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.

40.name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
40.description: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

41.name: Three Kings
41.description: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

42.name: October Sky
42.description: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

43.name: House on Haunted Hill
43.description: An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

44.name: Bringing Out the Dead
44.description: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

45.name: Election
45.description: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.

46.name: The Insider
46.description: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

47.name: Stuart Little
47.description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

48.name: The 13th Warrior
48.description: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

49.name: But I'm a Cheerleader
49.description: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

50.name: Bicentennial Man
50.description: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.
